WorkItem.Description:
I want to change some things around for a datepicker using the ExpressionDark theme's style definition for a datepicker.
 
Is there anywhere that I can access that definition. When I go to edit the template for the datepicker it gives me the default style definition, but I am using the ExpressionDark theme so it doesn't match up. 
 
Any help is much appreciated.
 
Thank you,
Robert Lewis
WorkItem.Summary: HELP- Datepicker ExpressionDark theme style definition
